encyclopedia.title: Dahlia
encyclopedia.fact: This flower is prized for its bright, full blooms.

encyclopedia.title: Protea
encyclopedia.fact: Known for its striking, spiky petals.

encyclopedia.title: Malva
encyclopedia.fact: Also called mallow, it has delicate, colorful flowers.

encyclopedia.title: Hesperantha (aandblom)
encyclopedia.fact: The evening flower opens its petals at sunset.

encyclopedia.title: Kappertjie
encyclopedia.fact: Nasturtiums add a peppery flavor to salads.

encyclopedia.title: Ranonkel
encyclopedia.fact: Ranunculus blooms in many vibrant colors.

encyclopedia.title: Sonneblom
encyclopedia.fact: The sunflower turns its head to follow the sun.

encyclopedia.title: Lelie
encyclopedia.fact: Lilies are famous for their fragrant blossoms.

encyclopedia.title: Tulp
encyclopedia.fact: Tulips are early spring flowers with cup-shaped blooms.
